channel.title: [REQ]spartan shield (back)[REQ]
channel.description: could someone make a spartan shield in back? like a cape but a round or kite shield on back of the character?

[/quote]

The point is, don’t talk about bringing an end to Winged items, if you put wings on your own items.

http://dictionary.reference.com/search?q=hypocrite[/quote]

item.title: [REQ]spartan shield (back)[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“sgtdonut, post:14, topic:273734”][quote author=time of rune link=topic=361737.msg2766335#msg2766335 date=1240831433]
The funny thing is, the last model by sgtdonut had wings
[/quote]

know what why the hell make such a big F*IN DEAL ABOUT WINGS OR CAPES? SO WHAT THAT SOMEONE ELSE HAS RECOLORED, THREW ON A NEW SYMBOL, THAT JUST GIVES MORE CHOICES IN THE GAME…AND IF YOU DONT LIKE IT STFU & GTFO AND DONT DOWNLOAD IT AND LET THE THREAD DIE ALL YOUR DOING IS BUMPING IT. ITS THAT FKIN SIMPLE GETTING SO SICK OF ALL THE CRITICS HERE ONLY MAKE THEMSELVES LOOK BAD.

THE HELL WITH ALL OF YOU THAT ARE SO OBSESSED ABOUT SAYING “ITS ANOTHER CAPE/WINGS GTFO OR I AM GOING TO RIP YOUR HEAD OFF”

KNOW WHAT A RECOLOR IS AN ART STYLE. AND IT IS HOW SOME PEOPLE EXPRESS THEIR CREATIVITY. WHY REMAKE SOMETHING THAT ALREADY EXISTS?

server needer i am sorry for useing your request thread to rant at assholes like this guy i quoted.
if someone does not beat me to this shield i will be more than glad to make it for you after i am done making my flaming head platebody.[/quote]

Wow… You just said

i said i will try to make this as well so we can put an end to the wing and cape, re-colors because everyone seems to like complaining about that a lot
And yet you still re-color and put wings on "your" last armor set. IDK if you make re-colors JUST DONT POST THEM HERE! Yes i agree that re-colors can be artistic, but this section isnt for editing someone elses work, its for making your own!

Read full topic

The funny thing is, the last model by sgtdonut had wings
[/quote]

know what why the hell make such a big F*IN DEAL ABOUT WINGS OR CAPES? SO WHAT THAT SOMEONE ELSE HAS RECOLORED THERES THROUGH ON A NEW SYMBOL THAT JUST GIVES MORE CHOICES IN THE GAME…AND IF YOU DONT LIKE IT STFU & GTFO AND DONT DOWNLOAD IT. ITS THAT FKIN SIMPLE GETTING SO SICK OF ALL THE CRITICS HERE ONLY MAKE THEMSELVES LOOK BAD.

THE HELL WITH ALL OF YOU THAT ARE SO OBSESSED ABOUT SAYING “ITS ANOTHER CAPE/WINGS GTFO OR I AM GOING TO RIP YOUR HEAD OFF”

KNOW WHAT A RECOLOR IS AN ART STYLE. AND IT IS HOW SOME PEOPLE EXPRESS THEIR CREATIVITY. WHY REMAKE SOMETHING THAT ALREADY EXISTS?

server needer i am sorry for useing your request thread to rant at assholes like this guy i quoted.
if someone does not beat me to this shield i will be more than glad to make it for you after i am done making my flaming head platebody.[/quote]

Sorry but you need a reality trip…No matter what you make, people are going to comment/criticize it…

You can either A: Accept the critisism and try to make the model better…
Or…B: Ignore it.
And last but not least, C: Take it WAY too fucking seriously and flame people making yourself look like a retarded 5-year-old.

Hope this helped.

item.title: [REQ]spartan shield (back)[REQ]
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I know alot of people say this alot but use the search bar

Search Spartan Shield. If not gallow around Google

The use of post’s on these fourms is a serious thing to other Members so little post’s wind people up a bit.

The Search Bar may not work at time’s so you may have to move on the posting helping threads and such. But there are also alot of other ways then posting a helping thread. Such as the google Web Search. Im sure you will find the model Searching Google. Just to let you know Posting a thread requesting help here should be the last thing you do. Therefore searching google using the Searh Bar are the first things you should do.

If i could bring this model to these sections i would but suddenly i do not have this request so sorry.

Read full topic
